Statements by Mrs. White in the Interview 

     I am telling you these experiences, in order that you may know what we have passed through. . . . Some [fanatics after 1844] would dance up and down, singing, "Glory, glory, glory, glory, glory, glory." Sometimes I would sit still until they got through, and then I would rise and say, "This is not the way the Lord works. He does not make impressions in this way. We must direct the minds of the people to the Word as the foundation of our faith."
